item.description:
Sat, 10/17, 1-5pm, $55

♦ Do you often put other’s needs before your own?
♦ Do you find it challenging to assert yourself or set appropriate boundaries?
♦ Do you experience anger as an uncomfortable, scary or dangerous emotion?

Whether you are a man or a woman, this workshop is for you! In a supportive environment you will learn:

♦ The healing value of anger.
♦ Safe and appropriate ways to express anger.
♦ About your energy field and the impact others have on it.
♦ How to set and adjust your personal boundaries according to circumstance.
♦ How to take care of your own needs while still caring about other’s needs.
♦ Personal empowerment tools you can use right away!
item.how_to_find_us: Door to the left of the Burren.
item.name: Friending Your Anger; Reclaiming Your Power
